response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product not only boasts exceptional quality but also comes with a suite of features that can significantly enhance your experience. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $9,995 for you.
